text: Disney Magicboard Online (迪士尼魔幻飞板) is a racing online game featuring Disney characters. This online game was released only in China on December 10, 2007. It was developed by the China game developer Shanda under license of The Walt Disney Company. ==Gameplay== Players can control the magicboard by using the arrow keys on the keyboard. They can choose only one character. After they choose, it cannot change back. ==Playable characters== * Mickey Mouse * Minnie Mouse * Goofy * Donald Duck * Daisy Duck * Pluto ==References== ==Other websites== * Official game site via Internet Archive (August 17th, 2007) Category:2007 video games Category:Disney video games Category:Massively multiplayer online role-playing games Category:Video games developed in China Category:Windows games
title: Disney Magicboard Online
